content.prompt: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. The exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Bon d’accord, mais tu termineras ton travail après le match.
Très bien, mais ne te couche pas trop tard! Tu dois te lever tôt demain.
Bon d’accord, tu me raconteras le film demain.
Très bien, mais fais attention à ne pas te blesser.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
